mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ise.price_discount AS price, ii.url AS imgUrl FROM `items` i /* 搜索展示最小的价格商品 spu */ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT min( price_discount ) AS price_discount, item_id FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) ise ON i.id = ise.item_id LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id WHERE i.on_off_status = 1 AND ii.is_main = 1 AND i.item_name LIKE concat('%',#{keywords},'%') ORDER BY /* 字符串和变量值 */ ${sort} DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ise.price_discount AS price, ii.url AS imgUrl FROM items i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT min( price_discount ) AS price_discount, item_id FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) ise ON i.id = ise.item_id LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id WHERE i.on_off_status = 1 AND ii.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{catId} ORDER BY
sellCounts DESC
price DESC
itemName ASC
LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}
